website_summaries.verdict: Whether your village of Calico Critters needs a bakery or the ultimate brunch spread, this cute collection of doughnuts, muffins, and churros has you covered.
pros: Includes Carol Bear, her yellow dress, display stand, tea set, and a wide assortment of yummy baked treats
cons: Her paper take out containers aren’t as sturdy as the rest of the playset

customer_reviews.title: It was a beautiful set for my youngest daughter
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful set for my youngest daughter, a 9-year-old who currently loves Calico Critters. The Doughnut Store was the perfect edition to our Calico Critters Luxury Townhome Gift Set, as it was cheap but great quality and had tons of things to play with. The critter that the set included was soft, beautiful, and adorable. A must buy for someone needing some sweet treats for the Calico Critters collection.
customer_reviews.author: Techno3

customer_reviews.title: Love this, my 3 year old daughter loves donuts ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this, my 3 year old daughter loves donuts as we take her every Saturday out for a donut.... so we had to get this. The detail is amazing. The bear critter looks lifelike. We got this as an add on to our calico critters school, townhome, treehouse etc. it’s fun for her to pretend play! Very cute highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: urbnchic

customer_reviews.title: SO adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one for my niece and one for my neighbor's little girl. The Calico Critters are SO adorable! And such great quality for the price, especially given the crappy toys that are out there these days. The Critters hearken back to my own childhood of Sylvanian Families and Maple Town. And I think these are even cuter and better quality, if that is possible these days. Buy them...you (and the kids in your life) will not be disappointed! Heck, even my nephew LOVED the Critters present I got for my niece! I think he was a little jealous! So, yeah...good for girls AND boys!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detail!
customer_reviews.text: This set is simply adorable. The detail is incredible. The donuts look real. This was our first calico critters set and now we will definitely get more.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter picked this out for herself. Came right on time, and she loves it. And I think it is as cute as can be.
customer_reviews.author: al becker

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with Calico Critters
customer_reviews.text: All Calico Critters dolls and play sets are absolutely adorable! This set comes with a lot of little pieces and can be easy to lose or swallow for a young child. This play set is really cute and is a perfect add on for other CC sets such as the bakery or cake shop. Yes, I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Tinkerb714

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND cute with detail.
customer_reviews.text: Anything Calico Critters is adorable but this is BEYOND cute with detail. My daughter LOVES this set. Well worth the price. This is the cutest set ever!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Muro

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my niece for her birthday and she absolutely loved it, like actually squealed with delight! The donuts and accessories are very tiny but she’s into that so it was a total win!
customer_reviews.author: Shea LaFountaine

customer_reviews.title: Doughnuts anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Such an adorable set - my grand-daughter loves Calico Critters and doughnuts - perfect combo

customer_reviews.title: cute a perfect
customer_reviews.text: i havent open yet, its a gift, but just the glimpse of the tiny bear is enough for me to say these are super cute to collect and play with, now I wanna order more but for myself!! ahh <3

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how the bear is so flawless! the toys are so detailed and really well-made. I'm starting my calico critters collection and I'm going to order for more!

customer_reviews.title: Cute little treats for Calico Critters to enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this set. Her favorite treat is when we get to go to the local doughnut shop for a treat and now her Calico Critters can get their own treats.

customer_reviews.title: Great Presents
customer_reviews.text: the kids love it, these toys are great fun. hours and hours, worth the cost. My kids friends come over and we usually give them as presents as well. these are for kids generally 5 and over, now our 2 year old does fine, but the items are choke able.

customer_reviews.text: Cute set! Three little plates are just the right size to hold a cup and a doughnut. My kid likes it.

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I wish they weren’t so small - I thought my 6 year olds were ready for smaller toys but ended up loosing items quickly. So that stinks. Also stickers don’t stick well and paper to make items stink. Such cute toys and so much money you think it won’t be so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Blake

customer_reviews.title: Parts to small!
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter wanted this. I thought it had to many small parts. She is always loosing them.
customer_reviews.author: debe one

product_meta.title: Calico Critters Doughnut Store
product_meta.description: Carol Cuddle Bear is baking a variety of sweet treats at the doughnut store. Here you will find delicious doughnuts, muffins, cinnamon twists, tea and more! Calico Critters is a unique and adorable range of distinctive animal characters with charming and beautifully detailed homes, furniture and accessories. They live, work and play in an idyllic and wonderful place called Calico Village. These timeless, classic toys promote wholesome family values. These life-like, award-winning miniatures also inspire imagination and creativity. These adorable toys promote healthy cognitive development through pretend play. Acting out storylines will exercise narrative and critical thinking processes, while fine motor skills and dexterity improve as little ones manipulate the fun environments, critters and accessories. Mix and match with other Calico playsets.
feature_bullets: Over 25 pieces including Carol Cuddle Bear in her special outfit, display stand, assorted doughnuts, muffins, tea set, take out containers and more!
All accessories are 1:24 scale and are proportional
Carol Cuddle Bear is approximately 3” tall
Can be used independently or with all Calico Critters accessories
Mix and match with other Calico Critters play sets to create a whole Calico Critters village!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars104 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
